XFcExclusiveModeSettings Struct Reference

When application is set to non-exclusive mode, this structure is used to report the visible area of the framebuffer. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

INT32 mVisibleWidth
 Width of the visible area.

INT32 mVisibleHeight
 Height of the visible area.

Detailed Description

When application is set to non-exclusive mode, this structure is used to report the visible area of the framebuffer.

Height of the visible area.
